doc:
Mills Watson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mills_Watson 0 Mills Watson (born William Oscar Watson on July 10, 1940) is an American actor who is probably best known for his comedic portrayal of the law enforcement character Deputy Perkins, first on B.J. and the Bear and later as a series star on The Misadventures of Sheriff Lobo. He played Uncle Buster in the sitcom Harper Valley P.T.A.. Mills_Watson ( born William_Oscar_Watson on July_10_,_1940 ) is an_American_actor who is_probably_best_known for his_comedic_portrayal of the_law_enforcement_character_Deputy_Perkins , first on B.J. and the_Bear and later as a_series_star on The_Misadventures of Sheriff_Lobo . He played Uncle_Buster in the_sitcom_Harper_Valley_P.T.A. .
